name: Cultural House
description:
https://youtu.be/NwAeTmBN9Dw

As the 1st Cultural House of Szívküldi Lakótelep, we archived Naming Gallery.
It is such an honor that Alex and Lisa trusted me with its construction.
The Szívküldi Lakótelep (szívküldi= heart-sent, lakótelep=social housing neighborhood) is a multi-layered virtual reality Social Housing Neighborhood that considers the possibilities and dangers of ‘home’ in cyber-space.
I started this project with a self-portrait “Base” that’s built of my own memories. I reserve some parts for myself as a diary (Uncomfy is Comfy), and other places welcome all people to ‘move in’ with their own treasures; for example the Cultural House, that I built as an archive of the Naming Gallery and its community in Oakland.
